dao

Class MockModelDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.MockModelDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelDAO

    public class MockModelDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelDAO
    Mock implementation of ModelDAO for testing purposes. This class provides a simulated data access layer that can be configured to return predefined responses or throw exceptions for testing various application scenarios without requiring a real database connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MockModelDAO()
      Constructs a new MockModelDAO with default test data.

      Simulates user login by returning a predefined mock profile.

      Simulates user registration by returning a predefined mock user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MockModelDAO

        public MockModelDAO()
        Constructs a new MockModelDAO with default test data. Initializes the mock with a sample user and empty exception state.

    • Method Detail

      • setShouldThrowException

        public void setShouldThrowException(boolean shouldThrow,
                                    OurException exception)
        Configures the mock to throw an exception on subsequent method calls.
        Parameters:
        shouldThrow - if true, subsequent method calls will throw the specified exception
        exception - the exception to throw when shouldThrow is true

      • setMockUser

        public void setMockUser(User user)
        Sets the mock user and profile to be returned by subsequent method calls.
        Parameters:
        user - the User object to set as the mock response for user operations

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()

      • deleteUser

        public boolean deleteUser(int id)
                   throws OurException
        Simulates user deletion by returning true for positive IDs.
        Specified by:
        deleteUser in interface ModelDAO
        Parameters:
        id - the user ID to delete
        Returns:
        true if id is greater than 0, false otherwise
        Throws:
        OurException - if configured to throw exceptions
